com.ephesoft.gxt.core.shared.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.core.shared.util.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is utility class containing various string related APIs which can be accessed directly.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft

      • getTrimmedText

        public static java.lang.String getTrimmedText(java.lang.String text,
                              int textLength,
                              int numberOfDots,
                              boolean isDotAtEnd)
        This method is used to trim the string to the size of the characters passed with dots appended or in the middle according to the value of boolean isDotAtEnd.
        Parameters:
        text - String text to be trimmed
        textLength - Integer number of characters to be displayed
        numberOfDots - Integer number of dots to be displayed
        isDotAtEnd - Integer position of dots in the output
        Returns:
        String

      • checkForSpecialCharacter

        public static boolean checkForSpecialCharacter(java.lang.String text)
        API to check whether a string contains special characters. Only alphabets, digits and space characters are allowed.
        Parameters:
        text - String
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getDotAppendedSubString

        public static java.lang.String getDotAppendedSubString(int characterLimit,
                                       java.lang.String string)
        The getDotAppendedSubString method returns a substring of a string up to a given limit appended with '...'.
        Parameters:
        characterLimit - character limit
        string - String string from which substring has to be returned
        Returns:
        String substring of a given string

        Returns:

      • isNullOrEmpty

        public static boolean isNullOrEmpty(java.lang.String string,
                    boolean spaceAllowed)
        Returns true is passed string is null or empty otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        string - String to be checked for null or empty
        spaceAllowed - specifies if space is allowed as a valid value
        Returns:
        returns true if passed string is null or empty otherwise false

      • removeCharacters

        public static java.lang.String removeCharacters(java.lang.String strToBeModified,
                                char[] charsToBeReplaced)
        Removes the specified characters from a given string.
        Parameters:
        strToBeModified - String the string to be modified by removing characters from it.
        charsToBeReplaced - String the array of characters to be removed from the string.
        Returns:
        String the string created after removing the characters.

      • getIntegerValue

        public static int getIntegerValue(java.lang.String stringValue)
        Gets the integer value from the passed string. If parameter is not correct '0' will be returned.
        Parameters:
        stringValue - String passed string value.
        Returns:
        integer value in passed string.

      • isValidNumericValue

        public static boolean isValidNumericValue(java.lang.String value)
        Validates the value passed as a parameter and checks if the value passed is numeric or not.It returns true if value is valid numeric value otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        value - represents the value which is to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if value passed is a valid numeric value otherwise returns false.

      • concatenateUsingSeperator

        public static java.lang.String concatenateUsingSeperator(java.lang.String separator,
                                         java.lang.Object... objectsToConcatenate)
        Concatenates the List of String using the separator. Final result is the concatenated list of Strings in each separated by a separator
        Parameters:
        objectsToConcatenate - []Object of Strings to concatenate.
        separator - String separator to separate the two String in the final String.
        Returns:
        String concatenated String each separated by the separator.
